projects.title: Physics Grad Match
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered PhD Program Matching Platform
projects.description: A commercial web application that matches physics PhD program applicants to professors.
projects.extendedDescription: Leveraged AI tools to build database of professors and research interest and website for analyzing natural language input using LLM for keyword extraction and vector similarity search for matching. Website is prepared to be used by many future PhD program applicants this cycle.

skills.name: Open AI Embeddings and LLM model APIs

projects.impact: AI-powered matching platform connecting PhD applicants with professors using advanced vector similarity and LLM technology

projects.title: Rep Quest
projects.subtitle: Workout Tracking Application
projects.description: Built a web app that I use every day to track my progression in resistance training workouts
projects.extendedDescription: Leveraged AI tools to build a web app to track the sets, reps, and weight used for every exercise with graphs and performance metrics
projects.impact: Workout tracking application that I use every day to track my progression in resistance training workouts
